column4: hi, i made a backup with dd yesterday prior to tinkering with Compiz, now it doesnt work so I want to restore, so would I just use 'sudo dd if=/media/usbdisk/backup/image of=/dev/sda3' ? im in single-user mode, so I also need to check if my usbdisk is connected..
Im not gonna try anything yet as I can screw it up again
diana; no, I made alot of scripts and tinkered with my system
how can I see what drives are connected from a terminal?
anyone know a terminal command to see what drives/partitions are connected?
physical connection or the mounted partitions?
